title: Data Scientist - Machine Learning
description:
AI Innovations Lab is looking for a talented Data Scientist to join our ML team. You'll work on cutting-edge machine learning projects that drive business impact.

Responsibilities:
• Develop and deploy machine learning models for prediction and classification tasks
• Analyze large datasets to extract actionable insights
• Build data pipelines using Python, Pandas, and Spark
• Collaborate with engineers to integrate ML models into production
• Present findings to stakeholders and business teams
• Conduct A/B tests to evaluate model performance
• Stay up-to-date with latest ML research and techniques

Requirements:
• 3+ years of experience in data science or machine learning
• Strong programming skills in Python (NumPy, Pandas, scikit-learn)
• Experience with machine learning frameworks (TensorFlow or PyTorch)
• Solid understanding of statistics and probability
• Experience with SQL and data manipulation
• Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or GCP)
• Master's degree in Computer Science, Statistics, or related field preferred
• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills

Nice to Have:
• PhD in Machine Learning, Statistics, or related field
• Experience with deep learning (NLP, Computer Vision)
• Knowledge of MLOps and model deployment
• Experience with Spark and big data technologies
• Published research papers or conference presentations

Benefits:
• Salary range: $130,000 - $170,000
• Comprehensive health benefits
• 401(k) with company match
• Fully remote position
• Annual learning and development stipend ($3,000)
• Conference attendance opportunities
• Equity compensation
